title: Ep. 923 - An Inconvenient Muslim Terror Attack
description:
The liberal establishment downplays a Muslim terror attack on a synagogue in Texas, Ron DeSantis’s Democrat challenger compares him to Hitler, and Glenn Youngkin has a magnificent first day as governor of Virginia.
DW members get special product discounts up to 20% off PLUS access to exclusive Daily Wire merch. Grab your Daily Wire merch here: https://utm.io/udZpp
